19Maternal and Perinatal Health Outcomes
Direct Obstetric Case 
Fatality Rate
The direct obstetric case fatality rate (CFR) 
represents the proportion of women with 
direct obstetric complications admitted to 
delivering facilities who died. This rate 
serves as a quality of care indicator. A strong 
correlation generally exists between CFRs and 
rates for facility-based maternal mortality. 
Researchers are particularly interested in 
whether patient case management in higher-
